data.title: Top 20 Jazz Bands for Hire in Pittsburgh, PA
data.meta_description: Looking for a Jazz Band in the Pittsburgh, PA area? The Bash will help you choose the best local event vendors. Start here!
data.text:
Pittsburgh, PA Jazz Bands

Interested in hiring a professional Jazz Band? Then youâ€™re in the right place! The Bash has a wide selection of talented 20s, 30s, 40s, and smooth jazz bands that can play at any event: weddings, birthdays, corporate functions, and more. Book now with the best in the Pittsburgh, PA area.

Top-Rated Service

Our US based team of Account Specialists are here to help every step of the way. Since 1997, we've connected planners with vendors for over half a million events.

How long have you been performing as a Jazz Band?

RML Jazz has been performing in the Pittsburgh and surrounding areas since 2004. Venues include restaurants, jazz clubs, community concerts and festivals, Pittsburgh Downtown Partnership events, corporate events, weddings, and holiday parties. RML Jazz is a well-established and tight-knit group, and the members have played together in other bands prior to forming RML Jazz.

What makes you different than other Jazz Bands?

RML Jazz is different from other jazz groups in that we can perform from a trio up to a seven-piece group depending on the venue and event. This allows us to rotate our solo musicians for recurring trio or quartet venues/events- i.e. sax, keyboard, and drums for one booking, then trumpet, vocalist, keyboard, and drums for the next booking. This allows us to appeal to a wider audience, plus keeps our performances fresh.
